## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the use case it enables.

**Example:**
> "I'm working on a data logging application and need to append data to existing files efficiently..."

## Proposed Solution

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented, describe them here.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or examples about the feature request here.

## Impact Assessment

- **Breaking Change**: Would this require changes to existing code? (Yes/No)
- **Performance Impact**: Could this affect performance? (Positive/Negative/Neutral)
- **Complexity**: How complex do you think this feature is? (Low/Medium/High)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this is not a duplicate
- [ ] I have considered whether this fits within the scope of an SD card driver
- [ ] I am willing to help test this feature if implemented
